steps.description: Select a Module to which this DocType would belong
steps.label: Module
steps.title: Module

steps.description: Check this to make the DocType as Custom
steps.label: Custom?
steps.title: Custom

steps.description: A Field (or a docfield) defines a property of a DocType. You can define the column name, label, datatype and more for DocFields. For instance, a ToDo doctype has fields description, status and priority. These ultimately become columns in the database table tabToDo.
steps.label: Fields
steps.title: Fields
